mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM moimmember WHERE memberNum = #{memberNum} and cmoimcode = #{cmoimCode}

SELECT c.cmoimCode, comname, isopen, created, c.catecode, c.regcode, c.memberNum,NVL(moimcount, 0) moimcount FROM commoim c JOIN member2 m ON c.membernum = m.membernum LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT cmoimcode,COUNT(*) moimcount FROM moimmember GROUP BY cmoimcode ) cnt ON c.cmoimCode = cnt.cmoimCode WHERE c.memberNum=#{memberNum} ORDER BY cmoimcode DESC
